  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    AnswerRowPanel
    Panel representing a single answer option row in the answer section.
    AnswersPanel
    Panel displaying all possible answers as individual answer rows.
    MessagePanel
    Panel for displaying messages or notifications to the user at the bottom of the question view.
    MyButtonPanel
    Panel containing control buttons with integrated message display.
    QuestionButtonPanel
    Button panel for question management operations.
    QuestionListPanel
    Panel displaying a list of questions with theme filtering and persistent data integration.
    QuestionMetaPanel
    Panel for displaying a question's meta-information including the title and main question text.
    QuestionPanel
    Main panel for displaying a quiz question, including theme header, meta information, and answers.
    QuizButtonPanel
    Button panel for quiz controls in the quiz tab.
    QuizInfoViewPanel
    Panel showing quiz statistics and information.
    TabPane
    Custom tabbed pane for the application UI.
    ThemeButtonPanel
    Button panel for theme operations with theme selection correction.
    ThemeHeaderPanel
    Panel for displaying the current theme of the active quiz question.
    ThemeListPanel
    Panel displaying a list of available themes with selection functionality.
    ThemeListPanel.ThemeSelectionListener
    Interface for theme selection events.
    ThemePanel
    Panel for creating and editing theme information.
